For more coverage of the 2025 Cannes Film Festival, visit https://apnews.com/hub/cannes-film-festival. CANNES, France (AP) — Much of the cinema world has descended on the Cannes Film Festival as the French Riviera extravaganza kicks off its 78th edition.
